NuGet Server for Sitecore 1.1 rev. 150901 (step 1) ------------------------------------------------------------- Date: 01-Sept-2015 ------------------------------------------------------------- This package must be installed before you can install the NuGet Server for Sitecore package.
------------------------------------------------------------- *** POST-INSTALLATION STEPS *** Install the NuGet Server for Sitecore (step 2) package.
------------------------------------------------------------- *** ABOUT THIS PACKAGE *** This package doesn't install anything. It makes the following change to web.config:
1. Add the following to configuration > system.serviceModel
<serviceHostingEnvironment aspNetCompatibilityEnabled="true"/>
------------------------------------------------------------- NuGet Server for Sitecore 1.1 runs on: - Sitecore XP 8.0 - Sitecore XP 8.1
*** NOTE *** This module should run on any version of Sitecore that meets the requirements for the NuGet.Server package. For more information see https://www.nuget.org/packages/NuGet.Server
